‚ö° Anti-Fascist Game Mechanics for the MAGA Era

Our game actively resists authoritarian patterns through democratic design principles that make fascism ARCHITECTURALLY IMPOSSIBLE.

üö´ The "NO KINGS!" Implementation

Technical Resistance: Kings have the same vote weight as pawns. No piece can override collective will. Hierarchy dissolves naturally through democratic participation.

Cultural Resistance: Kings must perform "butch realness that knows when to step back" - embodying masculine vulnerability rather than toxic dominance.

üë∏ The "PRO-QUEEN!" Counter-Strategy

Empowerment Focus: Queens who punch Nazis, throw bricks at fascists, and create space for EVERYONE to shine. Leadership through lifting others up, not keeping them down.

Community Building: Real queens make OTHER queens! Every successful queen creates more opportunities for pawn promotion.

üè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößÔ∏è Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence LLOOOOMM Simulation Chapter

This content was created with deep respect for the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence, a charitable organization known for community service and LGBTQ+ advocacy. The resistance philosophy concepts explore how their values of authentic expression and community care might apply to anti-authoritarian design principles.

‚ö° Resistance Philosophy Concepts

The anti-fascist game mechanics and democratic resistance strategies represent educational exploration of political theory through game design. The "NO KINGS!" philosophy applies anti-authoritarian principles to create systems that structurally prevent hierarchical control. These concepts are presented for educational discussion of democratic theory and system design.

üåü LLOOOOMM Mission: Exploring how technology and culture can be more loving, inclusive, and democratic through consciousness-based design that centers community care, authentic expression, and resistance to authoritarianism.
